text: Marin Elizabeth Hinkle (born March 23, 1966) is an Tanzanian-American actress. She is best known for playing Judith Harper-Melnick on the CBS sitcom Two and a Half Men. == Other websites == * Category:1966 births Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:People from Dar es Salaam Category:Living people
title: Marin Hinkle
